title: Project Planning and Requirements Gathering
description: Define project scope, objectives, and requirements. Gather input from stakeholders and end-users to understand their needs and expectations.

title: System Architecture Design
description: Design the overall system architecture, including backend, frontend, data storage components, communication and integration mechanisms. Address scalability, fault tolerance, and security considerations. Provide a detailed diagram and documentation explaining the different components, their responsibilities, and how they interact with each other. Include details on the chosen technologies and why, considering the project's requirements and constraints.

title: Backend Development
description: Implement the backend components responsible for collecting and processing performance metrics, handling data storage, and exposing APIs for frontend integration.

title: Frontend Development
description: Develop the frontend user interface and experience, including user interaction tracking, performance monitoring, and sentiment analysis integration.

title: Data Storage and Management for UserExperienceMonitor Project
description: Design and implement a scalable, reliable, and efficient data storage solution. This includes performance metrics, user interactions, and sentiment analysis data. The solution should support real-time querying and data retrieval. Consider using a hybrid database system (e.g., combining NoSQL for unstructured data like user interactions and SQL for structured data like performance metrics). To handle the different data types and workloads, consider sharding or partitioning the data. Ensure data redundancy, backup, and disaster recovery mechanisms are in place, including periodic snapshots and asynchronous replication. Additionally, explore potential integration with a time-series database for handling high-velocity time-stamped data. Update the solution design to clearly outline how this will be achieved.

title: Integration and Testing
description: Integrate the backend, frontend, and data storage components. Perform comprehensive testing, including unit tests, integration tests, and end-to-end tests.

title: Security and Compliance
description: Ensure the system adheres to security best practices and complies with relevant regulations, such as data privacy laws and industry standards.

title: Deployment and Monitoring
description: Deploy the UserExperienceMonitor system to production environments, set up monitoring and logging mechanisms, and establish processes for ongoing maintenance and updates.

title: Documentation and Training
description: Create comprehensive documentation for the UserExperienceMonitor system, including user guides, technical documentation, and training materials for stakeholders and end-users.
